item.description:
MT ISRAEL Labor Day - Monday 9/7/2009 - Easy

8:15 AM Hooksett NH** - Target Rte 3A/River Road
8:30 AM Dover NH - CJ’s Park N Ride Exit 9 Rte 16

10:00 AM Wentworth Trailhead – Sandwich NH

Description:
A gentle to moderate grade on Wentworth Trail 2.1 miles to the rocky summit
of Mt. Israel with nice views. 1700'gain 4.2 miles total allow 3+ hours. Dogs welcome.
We will break up into fast and slow groups and stagger start times if there are alot of
attendees. Willing to hike in some chance of rain/heavy downpour cancels.

**On return home I plan to get off 93 well before Laconia (where everyone will be carting their boats from) probably exit 23 and follow 132 into Concord and from there take Route 3A through Bow/Hooksett and then home.

Directions from Concord:
1. Take I-93 N 36.7 mi

2. Take US-3 S/RT-25 S EXIT 24- toward
ASHLAND/HOLDERNESS/SQUAM LAKES .25 mi

3. Slight RIGHT onto N DEPOT ST/US-3 So./NH-25/DW HWY .7 mi

4. Slight LEFT onto US-3/RIVERSIDE DR/NH-25/DW Hwy
Continue to follow US-3/NH-25/DW HWY 3.7 mi

5. LEFT onto NH-113/SQUAM LAKE RD follow NH-113
(at Holderness General Store) 11.6 mi

6. Sharp LEFT onto GROVE ST paved becomes unpaved .4 mi

7. GROVE ST until it becomes DIAMOND LEDGE RD unpaved .33 mi
At the fork bear Right to Diamond Ledge Rd
(do NOT take Sandwich North Rd)

8. End 517 Diamond Ledge Rd Sandwich NH 03227
Go right to park in front of the MCC/Mead Conservation Center
Wentworth Trail (yellow blaze) starts to the left of building at hiker sign.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a NEHMU sign on the windshield of the car.
item.name: Mt Israel Labor Day Hike
